item.title: FriendShip
item.description: .myfriends { background-color: #fff; opacity: 0.9; } .myfriends a { color: black; } .myfriends p { display: none; } .friendurl { text-decoration: none !important; color: black; } .myfriend { width: 56px !important; height: 56px !important; border-radius: 50%; border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 2px; box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0, .15); margin-top: 14px !important; margin-left: 14px !important; background-color: #fff; } .frienddiv { height: 92px; margin-top: 10px; width: 100%; display: inline-block !important; }
